Recommendations received

  • Roshan Chandra Ayyadevara

    “I had the privilege of working under Abhishek as my project supervisor. He consistently set high standards, fostered creativity, and offered constructive feedback, which greatly contributed to my learning experience and the successful completion of my dissertation. Working with Abhishek was an invaluable opportunity, and I am sincerely grateful for the knowledge and skills I gained through our partnership.”

  • Abiya George Ennamprayil

    “I had the privilege of working with Abhishek during my final dissertation of my Masters degree in Data Analysis for BI , and I couldn't have asked for a better supervisor. Abhishek's expertise in our field was impressive, but what stood out the most was his friendly and supportive approach. He was always approachable, patient, and willing to share his knowledge. I genuinely appreciate his mentorship and can't thank him enough for the invaluable experience I gained under his leadership. I wholeheartedly recommend him as an exceptional mentor and expert in Data Science.”
